results.title: Comparing Simvastatin Monotherapy V/S Simvastatin-Ezetimibe Combination Therapy for the Treatment of Hyperlipidemia: A Meta-Analysis and Review
results.text_hl: The combination therapy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin-ezetimibe@@@ has the potential to be considered an effective and safe treatment modality for the management of @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@.

results.title: Effects of ezetimibe/simvastatin on lipoprotein subfractions in patients with primary hypercholesterolemia: an exploratory analysis of archived samples using two commercially available techniques.

results.title: Effect of simvastatin/ezetimibe 10/10 mg versus simvastatin 40 mg on serum vitamin D levels.
results.text_hl: AIM: To investigate whether combined treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@ 10/10 mg would increase 25(OH)VitD levels compared to @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg monotherapy in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with primary @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@.

results.title: The effect of simvastatin alone versus simvastatin plus ezetimibe on the concentration of small dense low-density lipoprotein cholesterol in subjects with primary hypercholesterolemia.
results.text_hl: The changes in total @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@, LDL-C and non-HDL-C were greater in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@ group (all p < 0.05).

results.title: Effects of statin monotherapy versus statin plus ezetimibe combination on serum uric acid levels.
results.text_hl: Following a 3-month dietary intervention, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ received @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@ 10/10 mg or @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg or @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ 10 mg.
